title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 451.8 - Discontinuance of safety groups
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 451.8 - Discontinuance of safety groups

State Regulations
(a) A safety group may be discontinued or terminated upon the adoption of a
resolution to such effect by the majority vote of the active members of the
group. The discontinuance or termination shall be effective as of the group
anniversary date immediately following the adoption of the resolution, provided
the State Fund is notified in writing and a copy of the resolution is given to
the State Fund prior to such group anniversary date and not later than 30 days
after the resolution is adopted. (b) A safety group may be discontinued or
terminated by the State Fund as of any anniversary date if, in the opinion of
the State Fund management, continued operation will not serve the basic
objectives for which the group was formed. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
